title: Max and Noel Oliver's story
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
abstract: A loving story for their grandchildren
description: Alzheimer's sufferer Max together with his wife Noel have told a story for their granddaughters that celebrates their life together as well as capturing Max's memories of his son, the children's father, who died when they were very young. Created as part of the 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer's Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth. You can create your own Digital Story. Ask at the Information Desk or visit www.acmi.net.au/digitalstorytelling
